PathOfBuilding.Notes:
IMPORTANT NOTES
BANDITS - Alira early on if you need resistances, otherwise take +2 passives or respec to it later. Pantheons - Brine King + Ralakesh until maps then Solaris + Shakari
LAB ORDER - (Norm/Cruel/Merc/Uber) Mindless Aggression / Unnatural Strength / Mistress of Sacrifice / Bone Barrier
Try to make sure you cap your resistances whenever possible (75, 75, 75) You can see this from the defence Panel on your character screen if you press the default key C. For everytime you kill Kitava your resistances will be reduced by 30 for a maximum of 60 reduced resistances after you kill Kitava the second time.
Get an Instant (Seething) Divine Life Flask as soon as you can. This flask is very important.
------Leveling------
Etheral Knives 1+ Etheral Knives - Act 1 - Nessa - Enemy at the Gate
Animate Weapon 4 - 8 Animate Weapon - Act 1 - Nessa - Breaking some Eggs
Animate Weapon 8 - 12 Animate Weapon - Act 1 - Nessa - Breaking some Eggs Melee Splash support - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged Brute Minion Damage support - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged Brute
Animate Weapon 18+ Animate Weapon - Act 1 - Nessa - Breaking some Eggs Melee Splash support - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged Brute Minion Damage support - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged Brute Melee Physical Damage support - Act 2 - Yeena - Sharp and Cruel
Bladefall 28+ Bladefall - Act 3 - Clarissa - Sever the Right Hand
Animate Weapon 38+ Animate Weapon - Act 1 - Nessa - Breaking some Eggs Melee Splash support - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged Brute Minion Damage support - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged Brute Multistrike suport - Act 4 - Petarus and Vanja - The Eternal Nightmare Brutality support - Act 6 - Lilly Roth - Fallen from Grace Melee Physical Damage support - Act 2 - Yeena - Sharp and Cruel
Raise Spectre / Zombie 31+ Raise Spectre - Act 3 - Clarissa - Sever the Right Hand Blood Magic support - Act 6 - Lilly Roth - Fallen from Grace Meat Shield support - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate Raise Zombie - Act 1 - Nessa - Enemy at the Gate
-----Auras/Utility-----
Pride / Skitterbots / Desecrate Pride - Act 3 - Siosa - A Fixture of Fate Summon Skitterbots - Act 2 - Yeeena - The Root of the Problem Desecrate - Act 2 - Yeena - The Root of the Problem
Summon Carrion Golem Summon Carrion Golem - Act 4 - Petarus and Vanja - Breaking the Seal Freeding Frenzy support - Act 3 - Clarrisa - A Fixture of Fate
Shield Charge Shield Charge - Act 3 - Siosa - A Fixture of Fate Fortify support - Act 3 - Siosa - A Fixture of Fate Faster Attacks support - Act 3 - Siosa - A Fixture of Fate
Vaal Molten Shell / Flesh Offering Vaal Molten Shell - This will need to be Traded / Vaaling a Molten Shell / Found in a Vaal Side Area or Mechanic Flesh Offering - Act 1 - Nessa - The Siren's Cadence Increased Duration support - Act 6 - Lilly Roth - Fallen from Grace
